body_html: the irony is that I only did that to see how easy it would be to add another Op called SliceUpdate (the non-dynamic version of DynamicUpdateSlice). Since then I've decided to implement a cheat version of int64 in my device, because I suspect it is a losing battle to keep XLA using only types that the core Ops indicate.

body: the irony is that I only did that to see how easy it would be to add another Op called SliceUpdate (the non-dynamic version of DynamicUpdateSlice).  Since then I've decided to implement a cheat version of int64 in my device, because I suspect it is a losing battle to keep XLA using only types that the core Ops indicate.
